020import static org.junit.Assert.assertNull;
021import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
022import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
023import static org.mockito.Mockito.when;

025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.HashMap;
027import java.util.HashSet;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Set;
031import java.util.TreeMap;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CellComparatorImpl;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HConstants;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfoBuilder;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.PermissionStorage;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.visibility.VisibilityConstants;
041import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.ReplicationTests;
042import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.SmallTests;

055@Category({ ReplicationTests.class, SmallTests.class })
056public class TestReplicationWALEntryFilters {
057
058  @ClassRule
059  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
060    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestReplicationWALEntryFilters.class);
061
062  static byte[] a = new byte[] { 'a' };
063  static byte[] b = new byte[] { 'b' };
064  static byte[] c = new byte[] { 'c' };
065  static byte[] d = new byte[] { 'd' };
066
067  @Test
068  public void testSystemTableWALEntryFilter() {
069    SystemTableWALEntryFilter filter = new SystemTableWALEntryFilter();
070
071    // meta
072    WALKeyImpl key1 =
073      new WALKeyImpl(RegionInfoBuilder.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
074        TableName.META_TABLE_NAME, EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
075    Entry metaEntry = new Entry(key1, null);
076
077    assertNull(filter.filter(metaEntry));
078
079    // ns table
080    WALKeyImpl key2 = new WALKeyImpl(new byte[0], TableName.NAMESPACE_TABLE_NAME,
081      EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
082    Entry nsEntry = new Entry(key2, null);
083    assertNull(filter.filter(nsEntry));
084
085    // user table
086
087    WALKeyImpl key3 =
088      new WALKeyImpl(new byte[0], TableName.valueOf("foo"), EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
089    Entry userEntry = new Entry(key3, null);
090
091    assertEquals(userEntry, filter.filter(userEntry));
092
093    // hbase:acl should be allowed through the filter
094    WALKeyImpl key4 =
095      new WALKeyImpl(new byte[0], PermissionStorage.ACL_TABLE_NAME, System.currentTimeMillis());
096    Entry aclEntry = new Entry(key4, null);
097    assertEquals(aclEntry, filter.filter(aclEntry));
098
099    // hbase:labels should be allowed through the filter
100    WALKeyImpl key5 = new WALKeyImpl(new byte[0], VisibilityConstants.LABELS_TABLE_NAME,
101      System.currentTimeMillis());
102    Entry labelsEntry = new Entry(key5, null);
103    assertEquals(labelsEntry, filter.filter(labelsEntry));
104  }
105
106  @Test
107  public void testScopeWALEntryFilter() {
108    WALEntryFilter filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new ScopeWALEntryFilter());
109
110    Entry userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b);
111    Entry userEntryA = createEntry(null, a);
112    Entry userEntryB = createEntry(null, b);
113    Entry userEntryEmpty = createEntry(null);
114
115    // no scopes
116    // now we will not filter out entries without a replication scope since serial replication still
117    // need the sequence id, but the cells will all be filtered out.
118    assertTrue(filter.filter(userEntry).getEdit().isEmpty());
119
120    // empty scopes
121    // ditto
122    TreeMap<byte[], Integer> scopes = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
123    userEntry = createEntry(scopes, a, b);
124    assertTrue(filter.filter(userEntry).getEdit().isEmpty());
125
126    // different scope
127    scopes = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
128    scopes.put(c, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_GLOBAL);
129    userEntry = createEntry(scopes, a, b);
130    // all kvs should be filtered
131    assertEquals(userEntryEmpty, filter.filter(userEntry));
132
133    // local scope
134    scopes = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
135    scopes.put(a, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_LOCAL);
136    userEntry = createEntry(scopes, a, b);
137    assertEquals(userEntryEmpty, filter.filter(userEntry));
138    scopes.put(b, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_LOCAL);
139    assertEquals(userEntryEmpty, filter.filter(userEntry));
140
141    // only scope a
142    scopes = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
143    scopes.put(a, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_GLOBAL);
144    userEntry = createEntry(scopes, a, b);
145    assertEquals(userEntryA, filter.filter(userEntry));
146    scopes.put(b, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_LOCAL);
147    assertEquals(userEntryA, filter.filter(userEntry));
148
149    // only scope b
150    scopes = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
151    scopes.put(b, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_GLOBAL);
152    userEntry = createEntry(scopes, a, b);
153    assertEquals(userEntryB, filter.filter(userEntry));
154    scopes.put(a, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_LOCAL);
155    assertEquals(userEntryB, filter.filter(userEntry));
156
157    // scope a and b
158    scopes = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
159    scopes.put(b, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_GLOBAL);
160    userEntry = createEntry(scopes, a, b);
161    assertEquals(userEntryB, filter.filter(userEntry));
162    scopes.put(a, HConstants.REPLICATION_SCOPE_LOCAL);
163    assertEquals(userEntryB, filter.filter(userEntry));
164  }
165
166  WALEntryFilter nullFilter = new WALEntryFilter() {
167    @Override
168    public Entry filter(Entry entry) {
169      return null;
170    }
171  };
172
173  WALEntryFilter passFilter = new WALEntryFilter() {
174    @Override
175    public Entry filter(Entry entry) {
176      return entry;
177    }
178  };
179
180  @Test
181  public void testChainWALEntryFilter() {
182    Entry userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
183
184    ChainWALEntryFilter filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter);
185    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
186
187    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter, passFilter);
188    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
189
190    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter, passFilter, passFilter);
191    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
192
193    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(nullFilter);
194    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
195
196    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(nullFilter, passFilter);
197    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
198
199    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter, nullFilter);
200    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
201
202    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(nullFilter, passFilter, nullFilter);
203    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
204
205    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(nullFilter, nullFilter);
206    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
207
208    // flatten
209    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(
210      new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter, new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter, passFilter),
211        new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter), new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter)),
212      new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter));
213    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
214
215    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(
216      new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter,
217        new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter, new ChainWALEntryFilter(nullFilter))),
218      new ChainWALEntryFilter(passFilter));
219    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
220  }
221
222  @Test
223  public void testNamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter() {
224    ReplicationPeer peer = mock(ReplicationPeer.class);
225    ReplicationPeerConfigBuilder peerConfigBuilder = ReplicationPeerConfig.newBuilder();
226
227    // 1. replicate_all flag is false, no namespaces and table-cfs config
228    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(null).setTableCFsMap(null);
229    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
230    Entry userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
231    ChainWALEntryFilter filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
232    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
233
234    // 2. replicate_all flag is false, and only config table-cfs in peer
235    // empty map
236    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
237    Map<TableName, List<String>> tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
238    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
239    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
240    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
241    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
242
243    // table bar
244    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
245    tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
246    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("bar"), null);
247    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
248    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
249    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
250    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
251
252    // table foo:a
253    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
254    tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
255    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("foo"), Lists.newArrayList("a"));
256    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
257    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
258    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
259    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a), filter.filter(userEntry));
260
261    // table foo:a,c
262    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c, d);
263    tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
264    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("foo"), Lists.newArrayList("a", "c"));
265    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
266    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
267    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
268    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
269
270    // 3. replicate_all flag is false, and only config namespaces in peer
271    when(peer.getTableCFs()).thenReturn(null);
272    // empty set
273    Set<String> namespaces = new HashSet<>();
274    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(namespaces)
275      .setTableCFsMap(null);
276    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
277    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
278    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
279    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
280
281    // namespace default
282    namespaces.add("default");
283    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(namespaces);
284    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
285    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
286    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
287    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
288
289    // namespace ns1
290    namespaces = new HashSet<>();
291    namespaces.add("ns1");
292    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(namespaces);
293    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
294    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
295    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
296    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
297
298    // 4. replicate_all flag is false, and config namespaces and table-cfs both
299    // Namespaces config should not confict with table-cfs config
300    namespaces = new HashSet<>();
301    tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
302    namespaces.add("ns1");
303    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("foo"), Lists.newArrayList("a", "c"));
304    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(namespaces)
305      .setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
306    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
307    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
308    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
309    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
310
311    namespaces = new HashSet<>();
312    tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
313    namespaces.add("default");
314    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("ns1:foo"), Lists.newArrayList("a", "c"));
315    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(namespaces)
316      .setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
317    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
318    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
319    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
320    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
321
322    namespaces = new HashSet<>();
323    tableCfs = new HashMap<>();
324    namespaces.add("ns1");
325    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("bar"), null);
326    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(false).setNamespaces(namespaces)
327      .setTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
328    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
329    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
330    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
331    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
332  }
333
334  @Test
335  public void testNamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter2() {
336    ReplicationPeer peer = mock(ReplicationPeer.class);
337    ReplicationPeerConfigBuilder peerConfigBuilder = ReplicationPeerConfig.newBuilder();
338
339    // 1. replicate_all flag is true
340    // and no exclude namespaces and no exclude table-cfs config
341    peerConfigBuilder.setReplicateAllUserTables(true).setExcludeNamespaces(null)
342      .setExcludeTableCFsMap(null);
343    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
344    Entry userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
345    ChainWALEntryFilter filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
346    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
347
348    // 2. replicate_all flag is true, and only config exclude namespaces
349    // empty set
350    Set<String> namespaces = new HashSet<String>();
351    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(namespaces).setExcludeTableCFsMap(null);
352    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
353    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
354    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
355    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
356
357    // exclude namespace default
358    namespaces.add("default");
359    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(namespaces).setExcludeTableCFsMap(null);
360    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
361    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
362    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
363    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
364
365    // exclude namespace ns1
366    namespaces = new HashSet<String>();
367    namespaces.add("ns1");
368    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(namespaces).setExcludeTableCFsMap(null);
369    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
370    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
371    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
372    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
373
374    // 3. replicate_all flag is true, and only config exclude table-cfs
375    // empty table-cfs map
376    Map<TableName, List<String>> tableCfs = new HashMap<TableName, List<String>>();
377    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(null).setExcludeTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
378    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
379    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
380    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
381    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
382
383    // exclude table bar
384    tableCfs = new HashMap<TableName, List<String>>();
385    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("bar"), null);
386    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(null).setExcludeTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
387    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
388    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
389    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
390    assertEquals(createEntry(null, a, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
391
392    // exclude table foo:a
393    tableCfs = new HashMap<TableName, List<String>>();
394    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("foo"), Lists.newArrayList("a"));
395    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(null).setExcludeTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
396    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
397    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
398    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
399    assertEquals(createEntry(null, b, c), filter.filter(userEntry));
400
401    // 4. replicate_all flag is true, and config exclude namespaces and table-cfs both
402    // exclude ns1 and table foo:a,c
403    namespaces = new HashSet<String>();
404    tableCfs = new HashMap<TableName, List<String>>();
405    namespaces.add("ns1");
406    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("foo"), Lists.newArrayList("a", "c"));
407    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(namespaces).setExcludeTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
408    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
409    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
410    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
411    assertEquals(createEntry(null, b), filter.filter(userEntry));
412
413    // exclude namespace default and table ns1:bar
414    namespaces = new HashSet<String>();
415    tableCfs = new HashMap<TableName, List<String>>();
416    namespaces.add("default");
417    tableCfs.put(TableName.valueOf("ns1:bar"), new ArrayList<String>());
418    peerConfigBuilder.setExcludeNamespaces(namespaces).setExcludeTableCFsMap(tableCfs);
419    when(peer.getPeerConfig()).thenReturn(peerConfigBuilder.build());
420    userEntry = createEntry(null, a, b, c);
421    filter = new ChainWALEntryFilter(new NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter(peer));
422    assertEquals(null, filter.filter(userEntry));
423  }
424
425  private Entry createEntry(TreeMap<byte[], Integer> scopes, byte[]... kvs) {
426    WALKeyImpl key1 = new WALKeyImpl(new byte[0], TableName.valueOf("foo"),
427      EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime(), scopes);
428    WALEdit edit1 = new WALEdit();
429
430    for (byte[] kv : kvs) {
431      edit1.add(new KeyValue(kv, kv, kv));
432    }
433    return new Entry(key1, edit1);
434  }
435
436  private void assertEquals(Entry e1, Entry e2) {
437    Assert.assertEquals(e1 == null, e2 == null);
438    if (e1 == null) {
439      return;
440    }
441
442    // do not compare WALKeys
443
444    // compare kvs
445    Assert.assertEquals(e1.getEdit() == null, e2.getEdit() == null);
446    if (e1.getEdit() == null) {
447      return;
448    }
449    List<Cell> cells1 = e1.getEdit().getCells();
450    List<Cell> cells2 = e2.getEdit().getCells();
451    Assert.assertEquals(cells1.size(), cells2.size());
452    for (int i = 0; i < cells1.size(); i++) {
453      CellComparatorImpl.COMPARATOR.compare(cells1.get(i), cells2.get(i));
454    }
455  }
456}
